about_the_game:
You are the latest prodigy of a special orphanage that trains the future psycogs, powerful tacticians that have the special ability to control mutants and fight in highly mediatised clashes. But things are stirring in the shadows of the school, and through your skill and the different people you’ll encounter on your way, you might find out what is really going on.

Mutants: Genesis is an online card game developed by Celsius Online. In this game, everything is about Epicness, Community and Collection! Battles take on epic proportions with fights with up to 3 players against bosses! Mutants: Genesis is made to bring back the sense of community in card games. It is also the opportunity to acquire hundreds of mutants with their own abilities, lore and animations and fight others to become the best!




--- BRING YOUR CARDS TO LIFE IN THIS NEW CCG ---

Mutants: Genesis is a strategic card game where your creativity and tactical thinking will lead you to victory. Create your own decks to take on other players in the arena. Summon Mutants and evolve them to gain power. In cooperation, join forces to defeat legendary Bosses and reap the rewards.

Are you ready to dominate the leaderboard?

--- FIND YOUR STYLE OF PLAY ---

Create your own deck with over two hundred cards divided between 6 unique genes and your best combinations of Mutants, Support Cards and Buildings to make your mark on the legend. Your mastery of deckbuilding and your ability to think on your feet will be your greatest assets!



--- REPLAY YOUR CHAMPION TITLE EVERY MONTH ---

You're not the only one who wants to become the world's best Psycog!
Claim your place among the Seasonal Champions by climbing the 8 ranks of ranked mode in dynamic seasons with regular balancing patches. Rewards and glory await those who dominate the rankings.

--- PLAY CO-OP WITH UP TO 3 PLAYERS ---

In PvE mode, prepare for titanic boss battles with 2 other players simultaneously, and take on the weekly challenges of the Temporal Rifts!



--- REWARDING PROGRESSION ---

Unlock cards and rewards through PvP or PvE progression and weekly cooperative challenges. These rewards will allow you to craft new cards to improve your decks.

--- GENES ---

Play with 6 Genes and their card to collect hundreds of cards!

Join the next generation of Psycogs and climb the ranks to establish yourself as Champion! Collect hundreds of mutants, fashion your own deck, cooperate with or fight other players!
